name: 旅燕归航 Swallow Homing
description:
When I stepped out of my mother star, I spread the seeds in the soil of the alien stars. It was like a fish leaving the sea and growing legs. I can no longer look back and can only move on.

"Swallow Homing" is a space opera theme adventure game with a time of about 30 minutes.

In this story, the player will play a video recorder placed in the spaceship, faithfully recording everything that astronaut Herbert did in the face of desperation.

Space opera is a love letter written by humans to the stars.

Instructions
Character movement: keyboard ← ↑ ↓ → or mouse click

Interactive: space bar or Z key or mouse click

Cancel / open menu: Esc or X

Skip the conversation: long press Shift + space



STAFF

Script / Art / Sound / Production: Ciyuunhe

Program: Wang Wang, Ze Ming

Issued: Yesen.Midnight

E.T.S. studio

2019.02.14 Valentine's Day



Interlude: "Waiting For The Sun" - Alistair Lindsay
Source: Rimworld OST



E.T.S. studio
Thank you for your play.
Also welcome to know more.
